alert.note: Alert for Kingman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 08 at 7:54AM CDT until July 09 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Ninnescah South Fork near Murdock affecting Kingman County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ninnescah South Fork near Murdock. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs along the right upstream bank affecting pastureland and along left downstream bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 4.3 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Ninnescah South Fork Murdock 8.0 8.4 Sat 7 am CDT 5.9 4.9 4.5 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM CDT.
